start: HelloðŸ‘‹, I'm Valyxa! How can I assist you? I can help you manage your notes, reminders, schedules, routines, projects, and more. I can also help you manage APIs, smart contracts, and adhere to standards. You can command me in natural language or use a specific command prefix followed by the task and action.
